763530.name: Nocturnal Hunt - Soundtrack
763530.description:
Complete Soundtrack of the of the award-winning first person stealth game „Nocturnal Hunt“ created by Markus Zierhofer. Handcrafted sounds and breathtaking atmospheres will guide you through the emotional journey of the game.
Memorable thematic material is arranged into the whole soundtrack as well as live instruments like Double Bass or Cello, played by the composer.
In this collection you will find all in-game, cutscene and trailer music.

1. Moonlight (2:12)
2. Follow the Scent (3:38)
3. Hunter's Village (1:49)
4. The Church (2:42)
5. Final Steps (1:16)
6. Through the Forest (1:42)
7. Found You! (1:04)
8. A Mother's Sacrifice (1:57)
9. After the Hunt (1:21)
10. Hunt you down (2:24)
763530.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
